name: vscode-yseopml
description: Implementation of YML language server in node.
author: Yseop

scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install --unsafe-perm && cd ../client && npm install --unsafe-perm
scripts.compile: npm run compile:client && npm run compile:server
scripts.compile:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.watch:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -w -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.package: npm install --unsafe-perm && npm run compile && npm run test && cd client && vsce package
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server-ci
